About Me

I am a software developer and logician
currently splitting my time between New Mexico and Cambridge, MA.
In my free time, I work on bioinformatics projects,
and on music and poetry

Since I don't use Instagram or Facebook anymore, this site also acts as a quasi-social-media outlet for me.

If you're interested in bioinformatics and systems biology posts, you may also appreciate my Microbiomics project .
